title: Romanov
creator_credit: Yuri Sokol, Sokol Films and Australia. Special Broadcasting Service
brief_description: The history of the influential royal Romanov family and their descendants search for identity are the subject of this SBS funded documentary. The tape covers present attitudes in Russia towards a monarchy, and follows the story of one Australian Romanov member who, with his wife, returns to Russia to research his heritage.
